bibl.title: Theognostos alias Moros and his Family.
bibl.note: With the exception of P. Stras. 573 all texts regarding this family are housed in the British Library: P. Lond. III 1478 (p. 215); 932 (p. 148); 935 (p. 30); 936 (p. 31); 939 (p. 174); 940 (p. 118); 1158 (p. 151); 941 (p. 118); 943 (p. 175); 942 (p. 119); 946 (p. 31); 1298 (p. 153); 945 (p. 120); 944 (p. 53); 947 descr.
Sijpesteijn Pieter Johannes, Theognostos alias Moros and his Family.
